Text: FW Oustanding ARsFYI Original Message From Mercaldo Vernon Sent Friday December PM To Bollinger Joni Cc Benningfield Robert Linhart Joe Subject RE Oustanding ARs All I need is a copy of the invoices in order to pursue I beleive I have already taken care of the OneOk for January Thanks Original Message From Bollinger Joni Sent Friday December PM To Mercaldo Vernon Subject Oustanding ARs Hi Vernon Karen is out for the rest of the year She and I only worked one day together in the past couple of weeks but I think she mentioned that she had talked to you about AR lines listed under her name that she thought were your companiesthey arent ones we work with The data is LAGERSTROM KAREN BENNINGFIELD ROBERT UNION PACIFIC FUELS INC TPPA COM Jan Sep LAGERSTROM KAREN BENNINGFIELD ROBERT KN MARKETING LP T COM Jun Jun LAGERSTROM KAREN LINHART JOE ONEOK ENERGY MARKETING AND TRADING T COM Feb Feb Just wanted to make sure you are aware of these and confirm that they are companies you work with Karen sent a note to Robert Benningfield asking for a status report for everything showing under her and she included these If I dont hear from Robert Ill call him on Monday Thanks Joni Joni Bollinger NNG Marketing phone fax

FW Outstanding Accounts ReceivableFYI Original Message From Benningfield Robert Sent Thursday December PM To Lagerstrom Karen Cc McCarran Penny Berger Larry Buchanan John Adams Jean Benningfield Robert Forbish Sherry Greaney Chris Hibbard Scott Janzen Randy Linhart Joe McDaniel Janet Scurlock Debra Sturr Kathy Vaughan Cara Woodson Harry Subject Outstanding Accounts Receivable Karen The requested information is attached If you have any questions please contact me at Robert

FW Outstanding Accounts ReceivableOriginal Message From Lagerstrom Karen Sent Thursday December PM To Benningfield Robert Barry Patrick Cc Bollinger Joni Subject RE Outstanding Accounts Receivable Opps I forgot the attachment This spreadsheet was provided Dana Jones We are finding errors or missing data on some of them Call me if you need more information Thanks Original Message From Lagerstrom Karen Sent Wednesday December PM To Benningfield Robert Barry Patrick Subject Outstanding Accounts Receivable Dave Neubauer has asked us to review the attached Outstanding Accounts Receivable list Please review and provide the following information on your accounts at your earliest convenience Correct Marketer Assignment Validity of Invoice Status of Collection date of last contact and response Shipper contact person Thank you very much for your cooperation If you have any questions please call me Thanks Karen Lagerstrom Enron karen nron

Kermit to Beaver Cc Janet Cara We have been asked to monitor any large nomination changes at the points within the Kermit to Beaver group The attached list reflects the receipt points with nominations larger than mmbtu The spreadsheet is located at UCOMMONSOUTH CENTRALKB ALLOCATION If you have any questions please contact Lynn or John Thanks Robert

Results of Duke Meeting Cc The following Items resulted from our meeting with Duke on November Resolve issue concerning January Reservation Charges by end of Shawn Davis Robert Penny Duke to return signed Confirmation Letter for K and remit amount due NNG by November Duke and NNG will schedule a monthly meeting after NNG Accounting Close to allow the identification of any issues in a timely manner A meeting to be scheduled in December to discuss the Bushton Audit Process between Northern Natural Gas Mobil and Duke If you have any questions please contact Harry Woodson Joe Linhart or myself Robert

FW Check it out Awards Cc Original Message From Dietz Rick Sent Tuesday October PM To Benningfield Robert Subject RE Check it out Awards Unfortunately the Check it Out Awards program has not been renewed If you have someone on your team you wish to reward for a significant accomplishment please check with Lynn to discuss whether she should submit a Personal Achievement Award request Rick Original Message From Benningfield Robert Sent Tue PM To Dietz Rick Cc Benningfield Robert Subject Check it out Awards Rick The South team would like to nominate several people in ETS for the Check it out Awards We have three questions What is the procedure for completing an award Is their an amount limit per team Is their an amount limit per individual Thanks Robert

RE Beaver Co IC POI Cc Beaver Co was shut in at pm Robert Original Message From Woodson Harry Sent Tuesday October AM To Janzen Randy Schoolcraft Darrell Buchanan John Kowalke Terry David Moon Email Vaughan Cara Greaney Chris Scurlock Debra McDaniel Janet Adams Jean Linhart Joe Sturr Kathy Benningfield Robert Hibbard Scott Forbish Sherry DLETS Gas Controllers Subject RE Beaver Co IC POI David Moon Duke Energy Field Services called and requested this Interconnect be opened up at a rate of dth beginning am Wednesday October th Thanks Harry Original Message From Janzen Randy Sent Monday October PM To Schoolcraft Darrell Buchanan John Kowalke Terry David Moon Email Vaughan Cara Greaney Chris Scurlock Debra Woodson Harry McDaniel Janet Adams Jean Linhart Joe Sturr Kathy Janzen Randy Benningfield Robert Scott Hibbard Email Forbish Sherry DLETS Gas Controllers Subject Beaver Co IC POI Duke Energy Field Services has requested this Interconnect be opened up at a rate of dth beginning am on Tuesday Oct th Any questions please call me Randy Janzen
Out of office and I will be on Comp Days Friday October and Monday October In my absence Randy Janzen will be providing assistance to my customers Thanks Robert

Roberts Absence AgainI will be out of the office from Wednesday January until Thursday January In my absence Cara Vaughan has accepted the responsibility to maintain my customer accounts If any concerns arise please contact me at Home Cell Thanks Robert
New Linam Ranch POI Cc We have a new delivery point The point is Linam Ranch Duke Delivery POI The purpose of this point is to provide fuel to the Linam Ranch Plt on an emergency basis Robert
October Production Cc Ola We need to balance POI mmbtu and POI mmbtu by the end of October Thanks Robert
Contract Transfer Agreement Revised Cc Please review and forward any changes by Monday February Thanks Robert

South Central Team Evening Coverage Cc Harry Woodson has agreed to be the primary am to pm person Robert Benningfield will assume am to pm normal schedule but Robert will also be the secondary person for the am to pm coverage Randy Janzen will be agreed to cover if the need arises The above schedule change will be effective Tuesday February Thanks Robert

OBA Revisions Cc Mary A list of OBA concerns for possible tariff revisions are as follows A mechanism to assure Operators remain within an acceptable tolerance on a daily basis or receive a penalty A mechanism to require specific reconciliation periods Quarterly A mechanism to require specific periods to allow a final contract disposition to a balance upon reconciliation The above suggestions would reduce the misuse of the OBA contacts Thanks Robert
SWKI Cc Penny I have attached the SWKI File
FINAL Mobil DDVC Procedure Cc The attached is the current procedure to complete the monthly Mobil DDVC Journal Voucher Thanks Robert
Mobil DDVC Procedure Cc I have attached the Mobil DDVC procedure for your approval If you have any questions or concerns please contact me at Thank You Robert H Benningfield
February Imbalances Cc EOG Resources are short to the pipe by mmbtu and the shipper has agreed to reduce their nom by mmbtu If you have any questions or concerns please contact me at Thanks Robert
